definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: But the continual offence is a very disputable concept in the theory of quantity of crime.
sentences.chinese: 而連續犯則是刑法罪數論中頗具爭議的概念。
